price: Alipo mwambia baba yake na watu wake: Ni nini haya masanamu mnayo yashughulikia kuyaabudu?
arabic: إِذۡ قَالَ لِأَبِيهِ وَقَوۡمِهِۦ مَا هَٰذِهِ ٱلتَّمَاثِيلُ ٱلَّتِيٓ أَنتُمۡ لَهَا عَٰكِفُونَ
footnotes: Ewe Nabii! Kumbuka pale Ibrahim alipo mwambia baba yake na watu wake kuwaonya juu ya masanamu waliyo kuwa wakishughulikia kuyaabudu: Ni nini haya masanamu ambayo nyinyi mmeshika kuyaabudu?

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: idh qāla li-abīhi waqawmihi mā hādhihi al-tamāthīlu allatī antum lahā ʿākifūna
